List Files

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

ls[source]

ls(path:Path, list_hidden=False)

List files, while hiding hidden files or directories by default

{% endraw %}

Get Files From Directory

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_files[source]

get_files(path:Union[str, Path], extensions:Collection[str]=None, recurse:bool=False, exclude:Optional[Collection[str]]=None, include:Optional[Collection[str]]=None, presort:bool=False, followlinks:bool=False)

Return list of files in path that have a suffix in extensions; optionally recurse. Use include and exclude for including/excluding folder names, presort to sort.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_image_files(path:Union[str, Path], include:Optional[Collection[str]]=None, exclude:Optional[Collection[str]]=None, recurse:bool=True)
